Name: Drone Simulator
About the game: Drone Simulator is a fun and challenging drone, quadcopter and UAV simulation game. Use a gamepad or they keyboard to pilot a wide and varied range of drones, from tiny micro quadcopters, hexacopters and racing drones to full scale professional grade delivery and surveillance drones. Free fly around the various environments, from country parks to dense forests, urban skate parks and industrial environments to vast hills. Or alternatively participate in one of the different challenge game modes (Time Trial, Circuit or Chaos Mode) to earn credits to unlock new drones and levels. Drone Simulator features an FPV camera mode so you can experience the action and high octane thrill of free flight drone piloting first hand.
